trans-unit.source: collectd: perf stats for Java on Unix in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: collectd: perf stats for Java on Unix in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Extended monitoring of your Java website with the CollectD plug-in for Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Extended monitoring of your Java website with the CollectD plug-in for Application Insights

trans-unit.source: collectd: Unix performance metrics in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: collectd: Unix performance metrics in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is in Preview.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is in Preview.

trans-unit.source: To explore Unix system performance metrics in [Application Insights](app-insights-overview.md), install [collectd](http://collectd.org/), together with its Application Insights plug-in.
trans-unit.target: To explore Unix system performance metrics in [Application Insights](app-insights-overview.md), install [collectd](http://collectd.org/), together with its Application Insights plug-in.

trans-unit.source: This open-source solution gathers a variety of system and network statistics.
trans-unit.target: This open-source solution gathers a variety of system and network statistics.

trans-unit.source: Typically you'll use collectd if you have already [instrumented your Java web service with Application Insights][java], so that you have more data to help you to enhance your app's performance or diagnose problems.
trans-unit.target: Typically you'll use collectd if you have already [instrumented your Java web service with Application Insights][java], so that you have more data to help you to enhance your app's performance or diagnose problems.

trans-unit.source: Sample charts
trans-unit.target: Sample charts

trans-unit.source: Get your instrumentation key
trans-unit.target: Get your instrumentation key

trans-unit.source: In the [Microsoft Azure portal](http://portal.azure.com), open the [Application Insights](start) resource where you want the data to appear.
trans-unit.target: In the [Microsoft Azure portal](http://portal.azure.com), open the [Application Insights](start) resource where you want the data to appear.

trans-unit.source: (Or [create a new resource](app-insights-create-new-resource.md).)
trans-unit.target: (Or [create a new resource](app-insights-create-new-resource.md).)

trans-unit.source: Take a copy of the instrumentation key, which identifies the resource.
trans-unit.target: Take a copy of the instrumentation key, which identifies the resource.

trans-unit.source: Browse all, open your resource, and then in the Esssentials drop-down, select and copy the Instrumentation Key
trans-unit.target: Browse all, open your resource, and then in the Esssentials drop-down, select and copy the Instrumentation Key

trans-unit.source: Install collectd and the plug-in
trans-unit.target: Install collectd and the plug-in

trans-unit.source: On your Unix server machine(s):
trans-unit.target: On your Unix server machine(s):

trans-unit.source: Install [collectd](http://collectd.org/) version 5.4.0 or later.
trans-unit.target: Install [collectd](http://collectd.org/) version 5.4.0 or later.

trans-unit.source: Download the [Application Insights collectd writer plugin](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=618634).
trans-unit.target: Download the [Application Insights collectd writer plugin](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=618634).

trans-unit.source: Note the version number.
trans-unit.target: Note the version number.

trans-unit.source: Copy the plugin JAR into `/usr/share/collectd/java`.
trans-unit.target: Copy the plugin JAR into `/usr/share/collectd/java`.

trans-unit.source: Edit `/etc/collectd/collectd.conf`:
trans-unit.target: Edit `/etc/collectd/collectd.conf`:

trans-unit.source: Ensure that [the Java plugin](https://collectd.org/wiki/index.php/Plugin:Java) is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that [the Java plugin](https://collectd.org/wiki/index.php/Plugin:Java) is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Update the JVMArg for the java.class.path to include the following JAR.
trans-unit.target: Update the JVMArg for the java.class.path to include the following JAR.

trans-unit.source: Update the version number to match the one you downloaded:
trans-unit.target: Update the version number to match the one you downloaded:

trans-unit.source: Add this snippet, using the Instrumentation Key from your resource:
trans-unit.target: Add this snippet, using the Instrumentation Key from your resource:

trans-unit.source: Here's part of a sample configuration file:
trans-unit.target: Here's part of a sample configuration file:

trans-unit.source: Configure other [collectd plugins](https://collectd.org/wiki/index.php/Table_of_Plugins), which can collect a variety of data from different sources.
trans-unit.target: Configure other [collectd plugins](https://collectd.org/wiki/index.php/Table_of_Plugins), which can collect a variety of data from different sources.

trans-unit.source: Restart collectd according to its [manual](https://collectd.org/wiki/index.php/First_steps).
trans-unit.target: Restart collectd according to its [manual](https://collectd.org/wiki/index.php/First_steps).

trans-unit.source: View the data in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: View the data in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: In your Application Insights resource, open [Metrics Explorer and add charts][metrics], selecting the metrics you want to see from the Custom category.
trans-unit.target: In your Application Insights resource, open [Metrics Explorer and add charts][metrics], selecting the metrics you want to see from the Custom category.

trans-unit.source: By default, the metrics are aggregated across all host machines from which the metrics were collected.
trans-unit.target: By default, the metrics are aggregated across all host machines from which the metrics were collected.

trans-unit.source: To view the metrics per host, in the Chart details blade, turn on Grouping and then choose to group by CollectD-Host.
trans-unit.target: To view the metrics per host, in the Chart details blade, turn on Grouping and then choose to group by CollectD-Host.

trans-unit.source: To exclude upload of specific statistics
trans-unit.target: To exclude upload of specific statistics

trans-unit.source: By default, the Application Insights plugin will send all the data collected by all the enabled collectd 'read' plugins.
trans-unit.target: By default, the Application Insights plugin will send all the data collected by all the enabled collectd 'read' plugins.

trans-unit.source: To exclude data from specific plugins or data sources:
trans-unit.target: To exclude data from specific plugins or data sources:

trans-unit.source: Edit the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Edit the configuration file.

trans-unit.source: In `<Plugin ApplicationInsightsWriter>`, add directive lines like this:
trans-unit.target: In `<Plugin ApplicationInsightsWriter>`, add directive lines like this:

trans-unit.source: Directive
trans-unit.target: Directive

trans-unit.source: Effect
trans-unit.target: Effect

trans-unit.source: Exclude all data collected by the `disk` plugin
trans-unit.target: Exclude all data collected by the `disk` plugin

trans-unit.source: Exclude the sources named `read` and `write` from the `disk` plugin.
trans-unit.target: Exclude the sources named `read` and `write` from the `disk` plugin.

trans-unit.source: Separate directives with a newline.
trans-unit.target: Separate directives with a newline.

trans-unit.source: Problems?
trans-unit.target: Problems?

trans-unit.source: I don't see data in the portal
trans-unit.target: I don't see data in the portal

trans-unit.source: Open [Search][diagnostic] to see if the raw events have arrived.
trans-unit.target: Open [Search][diagnostic] to see if the raw events have arrived.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes they take longer to appear in metrics explorer.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes they take longer to appear in metrics explorer.

trans-unit.source: Enable tracing in the Application Insights plugin.
trans-unit.target: Enable tracing in the Application Insights plugin.

trans-unit.source: Add this line within `<Plugin ApplicationInsightsWriter>`:
trans-unit.target: Add this line within `<Plugin ApplicationInsightsWriter>`:

trans-unit.source: Open a terminal and start collectd in verbose mode, to see any issues it is reporting:
trans-unit.target: Open a terminal and start collectd in verbose mode, to see any issues it is reporting:

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
